lines.text: Instructions
Employee Research Survey - Pilot Questionnaire
Thank you for volunteering to complete the pilot survey. Your suggestions and opinions on
this survey will be truly appreciated. We ask you to answer all the questions with much
thought and to review this entire document. The objective of this pilot survey is to assess every
aspect of the survey and to provide as much feed back as possible.
While taking the survey, please look for any errors or points of confusion. If there are words
that you do not understand or a statement that is confusing then please circle the word(s)
and/or statement(s). If there is a question which is unclear then please circle the question
number.
1Read each instruction thoroughly. Each section has the instructions and scale above the
questions. Some sections have different instructions then the previous one. Some scales are
different: one scale may be "1" to "5" and the next "1" to "9"." Please complete the survey
by yourself. The amount of time it takes to complete the survey is a concern so therefore do
not take any extended breaks while completing the survey.
2)Each question should be answered twice unless otherwise noted in the instructions. In the
left column, you should put your response for PMMC and on the right column, you should
put your response for Philip Morris Companies. Below is a sample question:
PMMC
Philip Morris Companies
Not at all
Extremely
Not at all
Extremely
Satisfied
Satisfied
Satisfied
Satisfied
1. Producing quality products
Please do not leave after you have finished the survey. You will be asked to complete a
questionnaire about the pilot survey. We value your comments on the pilot survey and your
opinion/suggestions will be used to enhance the survey. There will be a group discussion of
the entire pilot survey after everyone has completed the pilot survey. Please give the survey
and questionnaire in a sealed envelope to the proctor after the group discussion is over.
4) Your responses to the survey questions will be kept confidential.
**Thank you for your time and effort.
Employee Research Survey - Pilot Questionnaire
Page 1

full_text:
Instructions
Employee Research Survey - Pilot Questionnaire
Thank you for volunteering to complete the pilot survey. Your suggestions and opinions on
this survey will be truly appreciated. We ask you to answer all the questions with much
thought and to review this entire document. The objective of this pilot survey is to assess every
aspect of the survey and to provide as much feed back as possible.
While taking the survey, please look for any errors or points of confusion. If there are words
that you do not understand or a statement that is confusing then please circle the word(s)
and/or statement(s). If there is a question which is unclear then please circle the question
number.
1Read each instruction thoroughly. Each section has the instructions and scale above the
questions. Some sections have different instructions then the previous one. Some scales are
different: one scale may be "1" to "5" and the next "1" to "9"." Please complete the survey
by yourself. The amount of time it takes to complete the survey is a concern so therefore do
not take any extended breaks while completing the survey.
2)Each question should be answered twice unless otherwise noted in the instructions. In the
left column, you should put your response for PMMC and on the right column, you should
put your response for Philip Morris Companies. Below is a sample question:
PMMC
Philip Morris Companies
Not at all
←→
Extremely
Not at all
←—→
Extremely
Satisfied
Satisfied
Satisfied
Satisfied

1
Please do not leave after you have finished the survey. You will be asked to complete a
questionnaire about the pilot survey. We value your comments on the pilot survey and your
opinion/suggestions will be used to enhance the survey. There will be a group discussion of
the entire pilot survey after everyone has completed the pilot survey. Please give the survey
and questionnaire in a sealed envelope to the proctor after the group discussion is over.
4) Your responses to the survey questions will be kept confidential.
**Thank you for your time and effort.
Employee Research Survey - Pilot Questionnaire
